title: Mobile-Based Medical Language Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Language communication training for healthcare professionals to improve workplace environments. Asynchronous learning environment using mobile devices and LMS

learning_goals: Learners can utilize medical-situation-specific terminology with over 90% accuracy via a mobile app.
Learners can perform and incorporate feedback from patient-doctor scenario-based role-playing on an asynchronous discussion board twice weekly.
Learners can complete 100% of infection control-related questions in the LMS quiz system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
